comments.body:
```suggestion
WARNING: To properly test cancellation, you should also ensure that
`fork := true` is set in the sbt configuration, otherwise sbt will
intercept the cancellation because it will be running the program
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +469,473 @@WARNING: To properly test cancelation, You should also ensure that
`fork := true` is set in the sbt configuration, otherwise sbt will
intercept the cancelation because it will be running the program
in the same JVM as itself.

comments.body: I like how you linked instructions for this in the other one.  Perhaps here, too.
